page.title: 03SATURDAY FOR AN 11 YEAR OLD
page.content:
A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MALA PARMA
0830 She wakes up, bathes and dresses. Has breakfast. 0930 Goes to Gujarati classes with her 2 brothers. 1130 Goes home, rests for 30 minutes. 1220 Goes food shopping with her mum. 1330 Returns home, puts away food,goes to the launderette. 1730 Sorts out washed clothes at home. 1800 Goes for a walk with her friend and dog. 1900 Sisters arrive home, one by one. 2000 Family has dinner. 2045 Goes for walk with her sister. 2100 Does homework. 2200 Watches television 2230-2330 Goes to bed, depending on television programmes.
